headline: New Breed Defense Innovator Breaks Out After This Q2 Reveal
summary: Leidos stock broke out above an entry Tuesday after the defense and aerospace technology company topped estimates for Q2 results.  Leidos reported a 22% increase in earnings to a record $3.21 per share adjusted.  Leidos recorded $3.9 billion in net bookings during the quarter, bringing the total backlog to $46.2 billion.

headline: Leidos raises full-year profit forecast on robust demand for weapons
summary: The company has followed peer Northrop Grumman in lifting its 2025 profit forecast.  Leidos now expects its annual adjusted profit at between $11.15 and $11.45 per share, compared with its prior forecast of $10.35 to $10.75.  Leidos provides technology services to government agencies as well as commercial clients and is also a maker of drones and aerial defense systems.

headline: Leidos shares surge as defense firm beats earnings, raises outlook
summary: Investing.com -- Defense and technology contractor Leidos Holdings Inc. reported strong second-quarter results that exceeded analyst expectations, prompting the company to raise its full-year guidance.

headline: Leidos’s (NYSE:LDOS) Q2 Earnings Results: Revenue In Line With Expectations, Stock Soars
summary: Defense contractor Leidos (NYSE:LDOS) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q2 CY2025, with sales up 2.9% year on year to $4.25 billion. The company’s outlook for the full year was close to analysts’ estimates with revenue guided to $17.1 billion at the midpoint. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.21 per share was 20.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

The company’s outlook for the full year was close to analysts’ estimates with revenue guided to $17.1 billion at the midpoint. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.21 per share was 20.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Leidos: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Reston, Virginia-based company said it had profit of $3.01. Earnings, adjusted for amortization costs and costs related to mergers and acquisitions, were $3.21 per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Leidos: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Reston, Virginia-based company said it had profit of $3.01. Earnings, adjusted for amortization costs and costs related to mergers and acquisitions, were $3.21 per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.
